name: A Ball In Space
description:
A simple project that I started just for fun, so it's very buggy and without sounds, please don't flame.

Every new game you will be spawned near your spaceship (Nice Design), in a new map with 10 random generated planets. 

Every planet has an unique terrain and gravity force, check their location with the map.

-COMMANDS (IMPORTANT)- 

Outside Spaceship:

A and D to move,

E to enter spaceship,

Space to jump

Inside Spaceship:

A and D to turn,

W to thrust forward,

S to thrust backwards,

TAB(only on planets) reset spaceship

HUD:

Mouse Wheel to zoom in and out

M for map,

I for inventory (In Developement),

ESC for Menu

Trello (Sorry it's in Italian): https://trello.com/b/XgnxAnQI/project-a-ball-in-space
